alert.note: Alert for DeKalb (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 5:28PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of DeKalb County through 600 PM EDT... At 528 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over East Lake, or over Decatur, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Atlanta, Decatur, Chamblee, Clarkston, Stone Mountain, Avondale Estates, Lithonia, Pine Lake, Belvedere Park, North Decatur, North Druid Hills, Candler-Mcafee, Druid Hills, North Atlanta, Tucker, Belmont, East Lake, Little Five Points, Snapfinger and Redan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
